T03n864u_001:3: nityānitye nirvikāre prajñe devi namo'stu te || 1 ||
T03n864u_001:5: prapitāmahi sattvānāṃ prajñe devi namo'stu te || 2 ||
T03n864u_001:7: manorathaprade śuddhe prajñe devi namo'stu te || 3 ||
T03n864u_001:8: lakṣmīstvamasi kalyāṇi śrīrdhīḥ śraddhā dhṛtiḥ smṛtiḥ |
T03n864u_001:9: sarvasvarūpe sarveśi prajñe devi namo'stu te || 4 ||
T03n864u_001:11: daśa pāramitākāre prajñe devi namo'stu te || 5 ||
